SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.java.drawing

Class PictureLoader

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.drawing.PictureLoader
public class PictureLoader extends Object
Utility class for loading, saving, and creating image files.

This class provides static methods to handle common image operations such as loading an image from a file, saving an image to a file, creating a new image with a specified background color, and retrieving a file filter for image file types.

Supported image formats include BMP, GIF, JPEG, JPG, and PNG. The class uses ImageIO for reading and writing images, and supports basic error handling for I/O operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • PictureLoader

      public PictureLoader()

  • Method Details

    • LoadImage

      public static BufferedImage LoadImage(File imgFile)
      Loads an image from the specified file.

      This method checks if the file exists and has a valid extension before attempting to read the image. If the file does not exist or has an unsupported extension, or if an I/O error occurs, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      imgFile - the file from which the image should be loaded
      Returns:
      the loaded BufferedImage, or null if the file does not exist, has an invalid extension, or an I/O error occurs

    • SaveImage

      public static int SaveImage(BufferedImage img, File imgFile)
      Saves the specified image to the given file.

      This method determines the appropriate image format based on the file extension. If the file extension is not valid, the image is saved in PNG format by default. Returns 0 if the image is successfully saved, or 1 if an I/O error occurs.

      Parameters:
      img - the BufferedImage to save
      imgFile - the file to which the image should be saved
      Returns:
      0 if the image is saved successfully, or 1 if an I/O error occurs

    • NewImage

      public static BufferedImage NewImage(int width, int height, Color backgroundColor)
      Creates a new image with the specified width, height, and background color.

      The image is created with the type BufferedImage.TYPE_3BYTE_BGR and filled with the provided background color.

      Parameters:
      width - the width of the new image
      height - the height of the new image
      backgroundColor - the background color to fill the image with
      Returns:
      a new BufferedImage with the specified dimensions and background color

    • GetFileExtensionFilter

      public static FileNameExtensionFilter GetFileExtensionFilter()
      Provides a file filter for supported image files.

      The filter includes all file extensions supported by this class and can be used in file choosers to filter out unsupported files.

      Returns:
      a FileNameExtensionFilter for supported image files
